DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform 12-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled human trial evaluate efficacy safety Kochujang pills improvement blood lipid . The investigator measure improvement blood lipid parameter , include Total Cholesterol , LDL-C , Triglyceride HDL-C , monitor blood pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Kochujang Pills Improvement Blood Lipids
DOC.criteria: Males female 1955 year old Total Cholesterol 200~260 mg/dl LDLC 110~190 mg/dl Able give inform consent Allergic hypersensitive ingredient test product History reaction test product gastrointestinal disease Crohn 's disease gastrointestinal surgery History alcohol substance abuse Participation clinical trial within past 2 month Laboratory test , medical psychological condition deem investigator interfere successful participation study Pregnant lactate woman etc .
